climatePledgeFriendly.details: Cradle to Cradle Certified products are made with safer materials and responsible processes to positively impact people and our planet. SILVER ACHIEVEMENT LEVEL

features: [ OIL FREE NIGHT LOTION ] Use Cerave PM facial lotion as the last step in an evening skincare routine. If layering with an eye cream, moisturizer or facial serum, apply the Cerave night lotion after other product applications have been fully absorbed

[ OVERNIGHT MOISTURIZER ] Cerave’s PM face cream contains niacinamide to help calm the skin and uses MVE Technology to deliver hydration throughout the night. It also contains hyaluronic acid to help retain skin's moisture
[ GENTLE ON SKIN ] Fragrance free, paraben-free, oil free, non-comedogenic, and allergy-tested

[ 3 ESSENTIAL CERAMIDES ] Ceramides are found naturally in the skin and make up 50% of the lipids in the skin barrier. All CeraVe products are formulated with three essential ceramides (1, 3, 6-II) to help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier
[ DEVELOPED WITH DERMATOLOGISTS ] CeraVe Skincare is developed with dermatologists and has products suitable for dry skin, sensitive skin, oily skin, acne-prone, and more.
body.description: Product Description Developed with dermatologists, CeraVe PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion has an ultra-lightweight, unique formula that moisturizes throughout the night and helps restore the protective skin barrier with three essential ceramides (1,3,6-II). This night cream is formulated to lock in your skin's moisture and helps restore you skin's natural barrier while you sleep. The formula also contains hyaluronic acid to help retain skin’s natural moisture and niacinamide to help calm skin.•Suitable for all skin types•Oil-free•Non-comedogenic•Fragrance-free•Gentle, non-irritating formula Key Ingredients:•MVE Technology: This patented delivery system continually releases moisturizing ingredients for 24-hour hydration•Ceramides: Essential for healthy skin, ceramides help restore and maintain the skin’s natural barrier•Hyaluronic Acid: This ingredient attracts hydration to the skin’s surface and helps the skin retain moisture•Niacinamide: Helps calm the skin Brand Story By CeraVe

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Light-Weight Nighttime Moisturizing Lotion Rich, smooth, yet lightweight texture spreads easily over skin and is absorbed quickly, leaving a non-greasy finish. How to Use When layering products like serums or eye creams, apply a thin layer & allow product to be absorbed fully before applying CeraVe PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion. Unlock the pump for first time use by twisting it to the left and pressing down several times until the product comes out. Apply the liberally to the face and neck at night, or as directed by a physician. Developed with Dermatologists All CeraVe products are developed with dermatologists. PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion is formulated without fragrance and oil and is non-comedogenic. Hyaluronic Acid, Niacinamide, and Ceramides Formulated with Hyaluronic Acid to help retain skin’s natural moisture, Niacinamide to help calm the skin, and 3 Essential Ceramides to help restore & maintain the skin’s natural moisture barrier.

Ultra-Light Moisturizing Lotion with Sunscreen SPF 30 AM Facial Moisturizing Lotion with Sunscreen SPF 30 Skin Renewing Day Cream with Sunscreen SPF 30 Skin Renewing Night Cream PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion Ultra-Light Moisturizing Gel Skin Type Normal to Oily Skin All Skin Types Healthy-Aging Skin Healthy-Aging Skin All Skin Types All Skin Types Key Ingredients Ceramides 1, 3 & 6-II; Hyaluronic Acid; Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Protection Ceramides 1, 3 & 6-II; Hyaluronic Acid; Niacinamide; Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Protection Ceramides 1, 3 & 6-II; Hyaluronic Acid;Encapsulated Retinol; Broad Spectrum SPF 30 Protection Ceramides 1, 3 & 6-II; Hyaluronic Acid; Niacinamide Ceramides 1, 3 & 6-II; Hyaluronic Acid; Niacinamide Ceramides 1, 3 & 6-II; Hyaluronic Acid​ Benefits Moisturizes, leaves a matte finish, and helps repair the protective skin barrier. Moisturizes throughout the day. Helps restore the skin’s protective barrier. Moisturizes throughout the day and helps improve skin’s texture and radiance without irritating Helps refresh the look of tired skin overnight with ceramides Moisturizes throughout the night and helps restore the protective skin barrier Moisturizes throughout the day and helps maintain the protective skin barrier​ Texture Ultra-lightweight lotion with matte finish Lightweight lotion Lightweight texture Rich, creamy texture Ultra-lightweight lotion Ultra-lightweight gel with matte finish​

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars CeraVe PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion: An Amazing Moisturizing Cream for Sensitive Skin
reviews.reviewText: I decided to try this product after seeing some influencer reviews and reading about the ingredients. I have sensitive skin and I was looking for a night cream that would hydrate, calm, and soothe my skin without causing any irritation or breakouts. I also bought the moisturizing cream from the same brand, I used it interchangeably with this moisturizer for different purposes. This product is amazing. It feels moisturizing and lightweight on my skin, and it leaves it feeling dewy, soft, and smooth. It has improved my skin texture and appearance, and it has helped with my skin barrier and moisture levels. It also calms my skin after using other products that might be irritating, such as scrubs or acids. It does not have any fragrance added but it does have a nice clean fresh smell to it which I appreciate, and it does not clog my pores or cause any skin reactions. In fact, it seems to improve any acne or breakout reactions from harsher skin products and negates the effects they may have had without using it. I use it during the day sometimes, and it does not make my skin oily or shiny. It is easy to spread and you do not need a lot of product to cover your face and neck. I even had an issue spot on my leg that the cream was too thick for and every other product seemed to irritate more and this was very helpful in clearing things up. I would highly recommend this product to anyone with sensitive skin and needs a night moisturizing cream that will hydrate, calm, and soothe their skin. It is worth every penny and I would buy from this brand again. This is the best creams I have ever used for my skin. It is a 5/5 product for me. Will definitely buy again. CeraVe wins with this for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Dry Skin Savior
reviews.reviewText: I've been using the CeraVe PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion for quite some time now, and I can confidently say it has become an essential part of my daily skincare routine. As someone with dry and sensitive skin, finding the right moisturizer has always been a challenge, but CeraVe has truly exceeded my expectations.One of the standout features of this lotion is its lightweight consistency. Unlike some heavy creams that can feel greasy or cloying on the skin, CeraVe PM effortlessly glides on and absorbs quickly. This makes it perfect for daily use, especially as part of my evening skincare ritual.The moisturizing power of this lotion is truly remarkable. Despite its light texture, it provides deep hydration that keeps my skin feeling supple and nourished throughout the day and night. I've noticed a significant improvement in the overall texture of my skin since incorporating CeraVe PM into my routine. Dry patches are now a thing of the past, and my complexion looks and feels healthier (even during winter)!Not only does it cater to my dry skin needs, but it also doubles as an excellent makeup primer. Applying foundation is a breeze after using CeraVe PM, as it creates a smooth canvas that helps makeup adhere better and last longer. This dual functionality is a game-changer for someone like me who prefers a simplified beauty routine.In terms of packaging, the pump dispenser is not only convenient but also ensures that the product remains hygienic and free from contamination.Overall, CeraVe PM Facial Moisturizing Lotion has become my go-to solution for dry skin. Its lightweight feel, intense hydration, and multitasking abilities make it a standout product in my skincare collection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizing and non-oily
reviews.reviewText: I have an oily, acne-prone skin which becomes a lil dry during the harsh winter. I use the CeraVe ultralight moisutrizing gel on my face, which is great. But, I felt I needed more hydration during my winter. I was looking for a product that is oil free and weightless but also gives intense hydration, and I fount this. I really like the texture of this moisturizer. This moisturizer suits well on my skin. It has no scent.Note: I use the ultralight gel in the morning and apply sunscreen on top of it. And, I use this pm moisturizer at night. I have been using both for now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything about this is good. I use it in the AM then top with a tinted sunscreen since I prefer a thicker cream for PM. But it is great, all the ingredients that dermatologists recommend at a great price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for combination skin
reviews.reviewText: So far working pretty well for my combination skin. Keeping cheeks mostly moisturized and t zone from being excessively oily. Minus one star because my cheeks could be more moisturized. Unscented. Lightweight

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No scent, creates a fine barrier on parched skin
reviews.reviewText: Consistency is like a serum plus gel.My skin is dry (always parched) and sensitive. My usual moisturizer is thick and expensive. Having recently ran out, I decided to try this one because of the recent hype about peptides for the skin.This light, opaque moisterizer absorbs quickly and completely. I use twice as much as recommended because my skin is so parched. Non-irritating and actually calming, it creates a light barrier on my face. I've used it for a few days and nights now and for the price, I'm actually impressed.This will serve as my in-between-paychecks moisterizer until I can buy the highly-moisterizing one I normally use. I will be using this underneath my normal moisturizer for that excellent barrier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product with a dry touch and good hydration.
reviews.reviewText: Good product. I have an oily skin, for this reason I use products to dry it, the product is helping me to hydrate my skin without making it too oily. Has a neutral smell and dry touch, in the picture you can see the actual size of the product comparing to a toilet paper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super light and hydrating
reviews.reviewText: Absorbs to skin very well. Love the feel of my skin on the morning after using it the night before.
Es la primera vez que uso cerave, me encanto soy una persona madura, al usar esta crema mi cutis a cambiado, se ve muy hidratado, seguro que para mi ya es indispensable en mi skin esta crema
Just try new one instead of Physiogel which i use for a long time, i will buy again this

reviews.reviewTitle: Great for men. Can't recommend enough!
reviews.reviewText: Guys in their 40's should be using this daily. Pair with the AM for all day protection.
It’s light and doesn’t leave oily residue on face. Have been using it for both am and pm and it works well.

reviews.reviewTitle: Cerave moisturisers are the best for sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: Cerave moisturisers are the best for sensitive skin.The formulation contains high quality ingredients which are present in high end brands priced extravagantly.At a very moderate price,Cerave offers the best quality skincare .It contains ceramide,hyaluronic acid, niacinamide --all anti-ageing ingredients with proven efficiency.With first use itself,one can notice tremendous improvement in skin texture ,fine lines,pigmentation and dryness.With all the goodness it is a very gentle formula with no fragrance (fragrance is a major skin irritant found in many products meant for sensitive skin),doesn't feel oily at all,gets absorbed quickly to give a matte finish .But it works wonders on the skin.My skin feels plump ,rehydrated and restoredI have dry,sensitive skin with seasonal acne ,seborrheic dermatitis and rosacea.Any kind of trigger ingredient is picked up by my skin in seconds and cerave is the only product thta has worked consistently at keeping of all my skin conditions for >2 years now.Will continue to use it forever.Moisturisers for sensitive i have used earliercetaphil-- very basic ,does not work on very dry skin,ni high quality ingredients other than hyaluronic acid.Neutogena- no anti ageing ingredient,irriatated skin, did not work in winters (very dry skin),had to be reappiled again and againBody shop- full of fragranceVichy aqualia thermale-- not very hydrating, major content is thermal water which is good individually but rest of the ingredients in the moisturiser are not great.Had to be applied again and again and irritated the skinLa roche posay toleraine - very good moisturiser for flared up dry skin with rosacea but have to be careful with quantity as can cause blocked pores .Very good for healing but no anti-ageing and restorative ingrdients
